issue.title: [CF 1189] Icon: Cooldown end flash
issue.body:
Add a "new" animation to notification animations: the default blizzard flash a spell icon does when coming off cooldown on action bars.


> Posted by CurseForge user Qustav_R | Imported from CurseForge issue #1189 | Raw

comments.body:
Addons can't trigger this at will. I'd have to muck with the cooldown sweep on your icons, which would have very unpleasant side-effects.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
